personal.name: Sandy Krish
personal.title: Specialist Programmer / Frontend Developer
personal.bio: Passionate frontend developer with expertise in Vue js, React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. I love creating beautiful, responsive, and user-friendly web applications.

projects.title: mealmaker
projects.description: Find a delicious meal to prepare at home with TheMealDB API and a better UI which make you happy and keep you to cook ;)
projects.longDescription: A user interface for TheMealDB API designed to help users find delicious meals to prepare at home. The project focuses on providing a better UI to enhance the cooking experience.

projects.title: ATS Kanban Board
projects.description: An Applicant Tracking System (ATS) using a Kanban board to manage the interview process and track candidate pipelines.
projects.longDescription: This project is a specialized Applicant Tracking System (ATS) designed to streamline the hiring workflow. It uses an interactive Kanban board interface where each card represents a candidate, allowing recruiters and hiring managers to visually track applicants through various stages of the interview process, such as 'Applied', 'Screening', 'Interview', and 'Hired'. Built with React, this tool provides a clear and organized way to manage candidate pipelines.

projects.title: JSON Visualizer
projects.description: A user-friendly and interactive tool for visualizing and exploring JSON data in a structured, human-readable format.
projects.longDescription: The JSON Visualizer is a web-based tool that allows users to paste their JSON data and instantly view it in an organized, human-readable structure. This project was bootstrapped with create-next-app and is built with Next.js . The application provides a user-friendly interface to make exploring and understanding JSON data easier and more intuitive.

projects.title: YouRAG - YouTube RAG Assistant
projects.description: An AI-powered tool that transcribes a YouTube video and allows natural language querying through a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline.
projects.longDescription: YouRAG is an AI-powered assistant that takes a YouTube video URL, automatically transcribes its audio, and allows users to ask questions about the content. It uses a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline with FAISS vector search to provide quick, context-aware answers from long-form video content. Users can ask for summaries, key points, or definitions, and the tool will generate a response based on the video's transcript.

projects.title: Clipboard Manager Chrome Extension
projects.description: A powerful, elegant clipboard manager Chrome extension with a macOS-style design that captures and manages all your copied text with advanced features.
projects.longDescription: This project is a powerful clipboard manager designed as a Chrome extension. It features a clean, macOS-style interface and automatically captures all copied text. Its core functionalities include maintaining a clipboard history, one-click copy, and duplicate prevention. It also offers advanced features like search, pinning important items, snippets management, data import/export (CSV/JSON), dark/light mode, and privacy controls to exclude sensitive sites. The extension is built with modern JavaScript and Manifest V3 for enhanced security and performance.

experience.description: Specializing in building high-performance applications that meet WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards. Focused on increasing page load speed, ensuring usability across diverse users, and converting Vue components into reusable web components.
achievements: Increased page load speed by 40% through optimized asset bundling, lazy loading, and caching strategies.
Led accessibility audits, ensuring 100% WCAG 2.1 compliance, improving usability across diverse users.
Spearheaded the conversion of 20+ Vue components into web components, reducing development time by 30% and enhancing UI consistency.
Implemented Playwright for end-to-end testing, reducing UI defects by 50% and achieving 95% test coverage.
Migrated frontend applications to Vite, achieving 3x faster build times and enhancing developer productivity.

experience.description: Developed enterprise applications with a focus on responsive, accessible, and pixel-perfect UI/UX. Translated UI/UX designs into fully functional web applications and optimized frontend performance.
achievements: Developed 30+ enterprise applications, ensuring responsive, accessible, and pixel-perfect UI/UX.
Translated 100+ UI/UX designs into fully functional web applications.
Optimized frontend performance, reducing initial load times by 25% through efficient asset management [3, 4].

education.description: Completed a Master of Computer Applications degree from Madras University.
Completed a Bachelor of Computer Applications degree from Thiruvalluvar University.

blog.title: AI-Driven Refactoring: Converting Legacy JavaScript to Modern ES6+ Code
blog.excerpt: Learn how AI-powered tools can refactor legacy JavaScript into cleaner, safer, and more efficient ES6+ style, with examples for var, arrow functions, and async/await.

blog.title: How to Run AI Models on Your Local System
blog.excerpt: A step-by-step guide on using Ollama to run large language models (LLMs) locally, eliminating cloud costs while ensuring privacy and performance.

blog.title: The Daily Frontend Tools – A Free Developer Toolkit
blog.excerpt: Introducing a free, fast, and privacy-first web app with essential tools like a JSON Visualizer and Color Converter, built for developers with zero tracking.
